# %in%

EX: a %in% table
Means: is a in table ?

```{r}
table <- c(1,2,3)
3 %in% table
```

# union

```{r}
x <- 1:5
y <- 2:5
union(x,y)

x1 <- c("a","b","c")
y1 <- c(1,2,"c")
union(x1,y1)
```

#intersect

```{r}
x <- 1:5
y <- 2:5
intersect(x,y)
```

#setdiff

```{r}
x <- 1:5
y <- 2:5
setdiff(x,y) #just choice x 
setdiff(y,x) #just choice y
```
